description:
A man helps a snake and is taken to the dragon god`s palace, and the dragon god offers him anything he wants.  He asks for water for his village. A white rat brings blessings to a man but his greedy neighbor steels it.  A lazy man finds a tiny hermit in a pot. The lazier he is the more the hermit grows, until at last it fills the whole house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mizu no Tane / Fuku Nezumi / Nannimo Sennin
The Water Seed / The Blessing Rat / The Hermit Who Did Nothing
水の種 / 福ねずみ / なんにもせん人
